childMarkdownRemark.html:
People


Xiao Ma


Xiao Ma is PhD candidate at Cornell Tech in Information Science. She was the WiTNY PhD Fellow during 2017 - 2018, during which she created the Ambient Belonging Project.

Shuqi Yang


Shuqi is a senior at SVA and a designer who is passionate about solving problems. She was in charge of unifying the visual design for the Fall 2018 installation of the Ambient Belonging Project.

Ananya Paul


Ananya is a first year graduate student at Cornell Tech, who is passionate about AR/VR. She is in charge of leading the Spring 2019 installation, with the theme "Win Together".

WiTNY


WiTNY stands for Women in Technology and Entrepreneurship in New York. Launched in 2016 with Cornell Tech, the City University of New York (CUNY), and industry partners -- WiTNY propels women into tech careers through education, work experiences, and community building.

The Ambient Belonging Project is run by WiTNY.

Learn more about WiTNY here.
